card.text: Originally called the Student Alumni Building (SAB), Balfour was the first building in the Modern, or International, style at Wheaton.
Balfour is now used for a variety of student events including contra dances, acapella group showcases, and much more.
The Balfour-Hood cafe is open every weekday, and gives a pleasant alternative to dining hall food.
The Loft, open nightly 2AM, serves students beer, nachos, and other late night favorites.
